title: Easy fish pie
ingredients: ['300ml milk', '1 tablespoon whole peppercorns', '1 bay leaf', '900g smoked haddock fillets', '4 potatoes', '1 pinch salt', '2 tablespoons butter', '200ml double cream', '2 to 4 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '2 to 4 tablespoons chopped fresh chives', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '200ml crème fraîche', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard', '100g baby spinach, steamed', '1 (200g) pack cooked mixed seafood', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'handful grated mature Cheddar cheese']
